title: Seeing Colour
description: Dispensing Optician Evie Matthews has her life entirely planned out—that is until a surprise breakup ruins everything. Fleeing her conventional lifestyle, she escapes to Edinburgh, Scotland, accepting a position at a private optometrist's office. Proving that a complete 180° is more complicated than it looks, Evie loses her luggage, her flat, and her nerves, ending her first day abroad drowning derailed plans at the bottom of a mojito and in the arms of an unexpected encounter.
author: Amber Faucher
